articles.title: Chance to see Dwight-Thirdy-Ray combo has to wait, laments Chot - Rappler
articles.description: 'We were looking forward to the combination of Dwight, RayRay, and Thirdy,' says Gilas Pilipinas coach Chot Reyes as Dwight Ramos suffers an injury ahead of the FIBA Asia Cup
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines It would have been a sight to see Japan B. League stars Dwight Ramos, Thirdy Ravena, and Ray Parks play together for Gilas Pilipinas in the FIBA Asia Cup.

articles.title: Gilas stuns top seed Mongolia to reach Fiba 3x3 Asia Cup semis - Sports Interactive Network Philippines
articles.description: Gilas 3x3 beats Mongolia to reach Asia Cup semifinals
articles.content:
ALMOND Vosotros went nuclear again when it mattered most as Gilas Pilipinas shocked top seed Mongolia, 21-20, to advance to the semifinals of the 2022 Fiba 3x3 Asia Cup on Sunday in Singapore.

articles.title: The Singaporean producer who helped bring award-winning films such as Pop Aye and Wet Season to the big screen - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In this week's instalment of Creative Capital, meet Tan Si En, 29, one of the youngest film producers in Singapore. Already, she has worked with celebrated directors, including Anthony Chen and Kirsten Tan.
articles.content: Tan also co-founded film and TV company Momo Film Co with her partner Kris Ong in 2018. Three years later, Singapore-based Beach House Pictures, which is part of Canadas Blue Ant Media, acquired a ma… [+778 chars]
